arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs Hoffenheim: Predicted Lineups and confirmed team news
arts.sum: Erik ten Hag will take charge of his first Bundesliga game when his Bayer Leverkusen side host Hoffenheim on Saturday afternoon. Up to three players could make their league debut…

arts.ttl: Preview | Bayer Leverkusen vs Hoffenheim: Die Werkself enter a new era under Erik ten Hag
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen enter their new era under Erik ten Hag when they host Hoffenheim at the BayArena on Saturday afternoon. The Dutchman has to contend with the departures of Florian…

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs. TSG Hoffenheim preview: Leverkusen aim for positive start to Erik ten Hag era
arts.sum: Last season's Bundesliga runners-up Bayer Leverkusen are entering a new era under Erik ten Hag, and they take on Hoffenheim at the BayArena to open their 2025/26 campaign.
